description:
Rouga and Cerberus save Bal from Doctor Gara`s latest attack. Bal gives Cerberus an Impact Monster card as thanks, and Rouga uses it to fight Dai. Gao is eager to face his former upperclassman in a Buddyfight, but Rouga has more than victory on his mind.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Danger! The Wolf Makes its Move!
デンジャー! 動き出した狼!!
